archimate:Product.name: Zeppelin
archimate:Product.documentation:
Zeppelin: Apache open-source web-based notebook proposes network visualization for data analysis purposes using Spark, SQL or Python data. There is a Neo4j interpreter. at https://zeppelin.apache.org/docs/0.8.0/usage/display_system/basic.html#network
TO INVESTIGATE - FREE, OPEN SOURCE, links to many database with various interpreter
